UniprotID	Q7RTS3
Accession	Q7RTS3;Q9HC25
EntryName	PTF1A_HUMAN
ProteinName	Pancreas transcription factor 1 subunit alpha (Class A basic helix-loop-helix protein 29) (bHLHa29) (Pancreas-specific transcription factor 1a) (bHLH transcription factor p48) (p48 DNA-binding subunit of transcription factor PTF1) (PTF1-p48)
GeneName	PTF1A BHLHA29 PTF1P48
Length	328
Function	Transcription factor implicated in the cell fate determination in various organs. Binds to the E-box consensus sequence 5'-CANNTG-3'. Plays a role in early and late pancreas development and differentiation. Important for determining whether cells allocated to the pancreatic buds continue towards pancreatic organogenesis or revert back to duodenal fates. May be involved in the maintenance of exocrine pancreas-specific gene expression including ELA1 and amylase. Required for the formation of pancreatic acinar and ductal cells. Plays an important role in cerebellar development. Directly regulated by FOXN4 and RORC during retinal development, FOXN4-PTF1A pathway plays a central role in directing the differentiation of retinal progenitors towards horizontal and amacrine fates.
Subcellular Location	Nucleus; Cytoplasm
Disorder	0.2783,0.3249,0.2541,0.3286,0.3215,0.2193,0.2951,0.3182,0.3426,0.2752,0.2064,0.2645,0.2715,0.3215,0.4051,0.3704,0.3392,0.3117,0.3494,0.4725,0.4330,0.4256,0.4149,0.5139,0.5176,0.4725,0.6322,0.6183,0.6269,0.6620,0.8013,0.8343,0.7289,0.6531,0.6531,0.6576,0.8050,0.8713,0.8894,0.8125,0.8198,0.7080,0.6227,0.6322,0.5901,0.5758,0.5758,0.5342,0.5342,0.4409,0.2988,0.1852,0.2436,0.3286,0.3599,0.3087,0.1702,0.1070,0.0870,0.0473,0.0765,0.0780,0.1206,0.2002,0.2328,0.2129,0.1731,0.2645,0.2034,0.1611,0.1791,0.2645,0.3840,0.4220,0.3983,0.3948,0.4220,0.5533,0.5493,0.6375,0.7547,0.7718,0.7547,0.8050,0.7718,0.7331,0.7672,0.8013,0.7672,0.7459,0.6482,0.5992,0.6620,0.6269,0.5854,0.5533,0.5992,0.6375,0.6375,0.7289,0.5951,0.6136,0.4766,0.4541,0.4652,0.4652,0.4582,0.4901,0.5211,0.5176,0.4940,0.5296,0.6269,0.5017,0.5296,0.4119,0.4119,0.3807,0.3215,0.2951,0.2364,0.2645,0.2328,0.3426,0.3460,0.2849,0.2849,0.2164,0.1881,0.1611,0.1115,0.1914,0.2575,0.2541,0.3053,0.2470,0.3215,0.3215,0.2918,0.3215,0.3494,0.4087,0.4831,0.4864,0.3983,0.4017,0.4292,0.4476,0.4901,0.5055,0.4369,0.5254,0.5456,0.4766,0.5098,0.5620,0.5620,0.5665,0.6136,0.5807,0.5854,0.6043,0.6089,0.6089,0.6089,0.6531,0.6712,0.6755,0.5533,0.6043,0.6043,0.6620,0.5296,0.5296,0.6136,0.5254,0.5098,0.5419,0.5854,0.4901,0.5901,0.5951,0.4940,0.5254,0.4330,0.4441,0.4685,0.4541,0.3840,0.4619,0.4541,0.3807,0.4186,0.5176,0.4330,0.4330,0.4330,0.4087,0.3321,0.3286,0.3182,0.2164,0.2193,0.1969,0.1206,0.1852,0.1823,0.1275,0.0929,0.1449,0.1275,0.1349,0.1275,0.1399,0.0909,0.1349,0.1349,0.1914,0.2129,0.2645,0.2680,0.3494,0.3494,0.3426,0.4292,0.5382,0.5419,0.5342,0.6269,0.7036,0.6851,0.6269,0.6183,0.7120,0.6851,0.7718,0.8050,0.8050,0.8013,0.8125,0.8125,0.8235,0.8162,0.8421,0.7629,0.6661,0.5254,0.5342,0.5254,0.5254,0.5296,0.5296,0.6136,0.6531,0.6482,0.6755,0.6712,0.6427,0.6806,0.6948,0.5707,0.6043,0.5017,0.5419,0.6531,0.6531,0.7163,0.8125,0.8050,0.8050,0.7209,0.7120,0.5901,0.5992,0.5758,0.5951,0.5493,0.5707,0.4831,0.4476,0.4507,0.5493,0.5577,0.5533,0.4
